column4: gtk-recordMyDesktop doesn't record the sound. I have the check box marked. I opened gstreamer-properties and it says I am using alsasink hw:0.0 for the output. So I went in gtk-recordMyDesktop's advanced settings and I changed the sound to hw:0,0. Still nothing... anyone can help?
Did you check in alsamixer for muted channels of 0% ?
my sound works. I played some music.
I mean for your mic channel
there is only Master and PCm in the alsamixer
now press tab - do you get  another list?
Why are you so mean to me, ubotu?  adamorjames Let's set it to 100%
could it be related to mplayer having a codec error?
vlc has no sound with the video either
